Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Taloa Heights - pool Taloa Heights - bungalow Taloa Heights - tree top studio Taloa Heights - bungalow 2 Niue Taloa Heights &vert; Return flights • 7 Nights • Transfers Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Nestled in the heart of Alofi, Niue’s charming capital, Taloa Heights offers a serene retreat where comfort meets island beauty. This boutique accommodation features seven self-catering studio apartments, including the unique Tree Top Studios perched at the highest point of the property, surrounded by lush native forest. View more View less 7 nights + flights & transfers from $ 1709 per person share twin Flying with Air New Zealand Enquire now Sale Period : until 21 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Deal Includes Return Economy class (The Works) airfares flying Air New Zealand from Auckland to Niue Add $160 per person return to fly from your nearest Air New Zealand serviced domestic airport 7 nights accommodation Return Niue airport transfers Rental Car add on Add on an Economy Hatchback (Honda FIT/Nissan Note or similar) from $560 for 7 days Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch from Auckland Tree Top Studio Perched above the forest with sweeping views of the ocean, our Treetop Studios are a guest favourite. Each studio features a spacious covered deck, complete with ceiling fans and stylish outdoor rattan furniture - perfect for relaxing in comfort while immersed in nature. Auckland 7 night package from $1709 per person share twin Travel 24 Jan - 27 Mar 26 Auckland 7 night package from $1799 per person share twin Travel 25 Apr - 26 Jun 26, 25 Jul - 18 Sep 26 Wellington 7 night package from $1869 per person share twin Travel 24 Jan - 27 Mar 26 Wellington 7 night package from $1959 per person share twin Travel 25 Apr - 26 Jun 26, 25 Jul - 18 Sep 26 Christchurch 7 night package from $1869 per person share twin Travel 24 Jan - 27 Mar 26 Christchurch 7 night package from $1959 per person share twin Travel 25 Apr - 26 Jun 26, 25 Jul - 18 Sep 26 Bungalow Featuring a spacious open-plan layout that seamlessly combines kitchen, dining, and bedroom areas, these units also include a generously sized bathroom. Ideal for guests who appreciate a little extra space to relax and unwind. Auckland 7 night package from $1799 per person share twin Travel 24 Jan - 27 Mar 26 Auckland 7 night package from $1889 per person share twin Travel 25 Apr - 26 Jun 26, 25 Jul - 18 Sep 26 Wellington 7 night package from $1965 per person share twin Travel 24 Jan - 27 Mar 26 Wellington 7 night package from $2049 per person share twin Travel 25 Apr - 26 Jun 26, 25 Jul - 18 Sep 26 Christchurch 7 night package from $1965 per person share twin Travel 24 Jan - 27 Mar 26 Christchurch 7 night package from $2049 per person share twin Travel 25 Apr - 26 Jun 26, 25 Jul - 18 Sep 26 If the advertised room type doesn't suit, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Niue sightseeing optional add-ons Snorkel Tour Snorkelling in Niue is an unforgettable experience. One of Niue’s greatest features is the incredibly crystal clear water. Its unlike anywhere else in the world, packed with vibrantly colourful coral and marine life. The experienced team at Niue Blue will take you to some of Niue’s best snorkelling spots, abundant with a wide variety of reef fish and beautiful hard corals. If you’re lucky, you might encounter the resident spinner dolphins during your tour an truly unforgettable experience. Price from $179 per adult Price from $109 per child (5-15yrs) Travel: 01 Jan-31 Dec 25* *Cyclone season closeout: mid December-mid February Duration: 3hrs Includes: Snorkelling gear, wetsuits & snorkel guide Whale Watching Humpback whales annual migration occurs between July to September. Your tour with Niue Blue will start with a presentation to learn about the whales, their behaviours, and migratory patterns before heading out to the ocean. Viewing these gentle giants from the boat is impressive, witnessing full breaches, flukes, playful spy hops and fin slaps. Price from $369 per person Minimum age: 10 years Travel: 15 Jul-30 Sep 25 Duration: 4hrs Includes: Snorkelling gear, wetsuits & whale guide Terms & Conditions Sales to 21 Nov 25 or until sold out. Prices correct as at 06 Nov 25. • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases and availability. • Packages are applicable for new bookings only. Package prices are based on return Economy Class (The Works) airfare flying to Niue from Auckland. • Departures ex Wellington or Christchurch via Auckland. Flights depart Auckland on Saturdays, arriving Niue on Fridays, while the return flight departs Fridays, arriving Auckland on the Saturday (subject to change). • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense. • Day of week surcharges may apply. Airfares are based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax & surcharge increases. • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified. • Bedding configurations may vary. • Min/max stays apply. • Full payment is required at time of booking. • Availability during holiday & peak travel periods may be limited. • Amendment and cancellation fees apply. • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability. Please talk to your House of Travel consultant for the most up to date availability and pricing. Advertised prices are per person (twin share) based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply. * FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. For finance terms and conditions visit hot.co.nz/payment-options. Sightseeing conditions: Prices are valid as at 23 Jul 25, but may vary depending on exchange rates. The price guide shown is a per person from price and is based on low season travel. Travel must be completed by 31 Dec 25 unless otherwise stated, closeout dates may apply. Tours and sightseeing are subject to change. Minimum/maximum numbers may apply for tour to operate, please ask your House of Travel consultant.
